translation: Th yylhi smndr (th dryav) votlith pkun lagn.
Pth lghi pth shkhṣs pe zikya ʿml chhe tmụ̄ brvnhh kun svuzmcz th pth kun (kya) avs trạvith āmut.
Ae ansan!cz kmụ̄ chyzn tvvnkh pnnis krym rbs mtʿlq dvkhs mnz.
Yymụ̄ (majhi hndis shkms mnz aakhi nṭfh nish) cz pạd kornkh,pth kornkh cz tmụ̄(tan shyrnh khạṭr godd) drst th syod,pth anụ̄ tmụ̄ chạnis bnavtts mnz tnasub san tbdyly.
Yath ṣvrts mnz thi yoczuhn tmụ̄ kornkh cz jvrith tyar.
Yhe chhe ḥqyqt (th) tohụ̄ chihv aath brʿks jza kis dohs ankar kran.
Yylhi zn tohyhi pytth rạchhdr frshth mqrr chih.
(yim) sytthah ʿzt vạlụ̄chih (tuhndụ̄ aʿmal namh) lykhn vạlụ̄ chih.
Tim chih timn (tmam kamyn) zanan yimh tohụ̄ kran chihv.
Be shk āsn nykv kar nʿmt kis jnts mnz.
Th be shk āsn bdkar (mṣybt kis) jhnms mnz.
Tim gczhn tath mnz qyamt kh doh dạkhl.
Th tim hykn nh tamhi (jhnm) nishhi (zanhh thi) ghạb spdith.
Th tohyhi kya smjhuv zi jzahuk doh kya chuh.
Pth kya zvnuvtohyhi zi jzahuk doh kya chuh.
(yhi) chuh suh doh yylhi kanhh shkhṣ kạnshi khạṭrkunhi chyzuk mạlk āshi nh,th ḥkm krun āshi tamhi doh Allah tʿālyā sundue.
